    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initialize data values on the form after it's loaded. Lambdas to format the date cells and to create anonymous event listeners. This is easier than dedicated methods since the functions are only meant for the calling control and none others. Lambdas are also used to create anonymous event listeners to enable the Edit/Delete button only when an appointment is selected

    • UpdateCalendar

      private void UpdateCalendar()
